sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_css"><sp_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>.bn-notify {
position: relative;
}

.bn-notify img {
  height: auto;
  width: 26px;
}

.bn-notify-badge-circle {
  min-width: 18px;
  min-height: 18px;
  padding: 4px 0px;
  font-size: 10px;
  vertical-align: middle;
  white-space: nowrap;
  text-align: center;
  border-radius: 9px;
  background-color: #e80000;
  
  position: absolute;
  top: 0px;
  left: 15px;
